text:
mySociety | Full Time Web Developer | UK | Remote (https://mysociety.org)

Are you a Ruby / Python / Perl / JavaScript developer, looking to work with friendly colleagues, on projects that make a difference, and fresh technology challenges?

If so, joining mySociety's 10-person development team might interest you. We’re a small UK charity making a big difference to Freedom Of Information, Democracy, and Better Cities worldwide.

Salary: £40,000 to £47,000 depending on experience, plus other benefits.

Application deadline: 10am on Monday 7th August. Interviews will take place week commencing 14th August.

Apply online at https://mysociety.workable.com/jobs/532193
